definition: Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: Alckmin congratulated Hu Jintao upon the great success of his visit.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔克明祝贺胡锦涛此行取得圆满成功。

sentences.english: Hu said China and Mongolia are friendly neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中蒙两国是山水相连的友好邻邦。

sentences.english: Hu calls on teachers to embrace innovation.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛要求教师要勇于创新。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabia is the second leg of Hu's current five-nation tour.
sentences.chinese: 沙特是胡锦涛此次五国之行的第二站。

sentences.english: President Kirchner held a grand welcoming ceremony for President Hu upon his visit.
sentences.chinese: 基什内尔在这里为胡锦涛来访举行隆重的欢迎仪式。

sentences.english: Hu said recent years have witnessed all-round and in-depth development of bilateral ties.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，近些年来，中委两国关系全面深入发展。

sentences.english: This is the second state visit to France by President Hu Jintao in the six years.
sentences.chinese: 这是时隔6年多后，胡锦涛再次对法国进行国事访问。

sentences.english: In the afternoon of the same day, Hu Jintao left Gran Canaria Island for Beijing by special plane.
sentences.chinese: 当天下午，胡锦涛乘专机离开大加那利岛返回北京。

sentences.english: Then he should call President Hu Jintao of China and express serious concern.
sentences.chinese: 随后他应该致电中国国家主席胡锦涛表示严重关切。

sentences.english: Hu said that we hope to further strengthen Sino-Malaysian cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，希望在新形势下进一步深化中马合作。

sentences.english: Hu said that the Chinese and Cambodian peoples share a long history of friendly exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中柬两国人民有着长期友好交往的历史。

sentences.english: Hu Jintao said that the people of China and Myanmar have enjoyed long-standing friendship.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中缅两国人民的友谊源远流长。

sentences.english: He raised four proposals on developing China-Ukraine relations.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛就发展中乌关系提出4点建议。

sentences.english: Hu's wife Liu Yongqing and Queen of Spain Letizia Ortiz Rocasolano attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛夫人刘永清和西班牙王妃莱蒂西亚参加了会见。

sentences.english: Hu and Koehler started talks in a cordial and friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛和克勒在亲切友好的气氛中开始了会谈。

sentences.english: Hu indicated that China attaches great importance to developing bilateral ties.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛表示，中国高度重视发展中沙关系。

definition: Jiang Zemin (1926-), politician, president of PRC 1993-2003
Liu Yunshan (1947-), PRC politician, background in journalism in Inner Mongolia, head of the Central Propaganda Department 2002-2012
Jia Qinglin (1940-), member of the Politburo Standing Committee 2002-2012
Wu Bangguo (1941-), PRC electrical engineer and politician, polituro member from 2002
Qian Qichen (1928-2017), former Chinese vice premier
Xi Jinping (1953-), PRC politician, General Secretary of the CCP from 2012, president of the PRC from 2013
Hua Guofeng (1921-2008), leader of Chinese Communist Party after the Cultural Revolution
Deng Xiaoping (1904-1997), Chinese communist leader, de facto leader of PRC 1978-1990 and creator of "socialism with Chinese characteristics"
Wu Guanzheng (1938-), former CCP Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection
